issue.title: [JS] JavaScript integration tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1501](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1501). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Tracking JIRA for integration test-related issues

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1501?focusedCommentId=16356255) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
`[~bhulette]` [~paul.e.taylor] can this be closed?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1501?focusedCommentId=16357061) by Brian Hulette (bhulette):*
`[~wesmckinn]` the integration tests still only test our ability to consume arrow data with JS, so we may want to keep this open until we have a JS writer we can use. I'll create some more issues to track that side of things
